thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beijing Bewinner Communications and units obtain high-tech enterprise recognition and to enjoy tax preference

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beijing Bewinner Communications and units obtain high-tech enterprise recognition and to enjoy tax preference

organizations.name: reuters) - beijing bewinner communications co ltd

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Beijing Bewinner Communications Co Ltd
* Says the company, Beijing-based IT unit and Nanjing-based communication tech unit were recognized as high-tech enterprises and could enjoy a tax preference of 15 percent, from 2017 to 2019
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/spQJKS
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
